lines.text: Oh my God. You hired drug addicts?
Who'd you expect me to hire? The Red Cross?
They seem like very polite boys.
I don't like having drug addicts in my house.
Oh no, Rosalie. Don't think of them as drug addicts. Think of them as killers.
If we keep shooting Joey, don't you think he might get suspicious?
What the hell's going on here?
He's been shot in the head!
Headache? he's got a bullet in him! Carlos, get an ambulance over here right away.
...I was gonna get a band-aid... for Joey...
If we're gonna waste the dude, we oughta get paid for it. I mean, that's the American way, ain't it?
This is only two hun'erd. We was promised five.
For killing him five, for wounding him two.
You wanted me to shoot him so I shot him.
You woke him up! What good is that?
[Discussing hiring a hit man to kill Joey]
As much as we have to.
Yeah, you know, not too much. Try for discount.
When somebody shoot you in the head it make you think.

[after Devo has shot Joey]
Are you alright?
Am I alright? Am *I* al...? Why are you asking me if I'm alright? He's the one who got shot!

Uh... 5 times the last 2 weeks... wait, no, that's wrong... it was uh... it was uh, 4 times this week, uh... with 3 women, and uh... 3 times last week with 2 other women... wow... plus one of the women from this week was the same as last week... or maybe 2 of the women was the same... so uh... I guess that uh... makes uh... what, uh... I dunno, 7 times... I mean it was more than uh... 7 times, father, it was, it was more like uh... 10 or 12 times but, you know, it was like on uh... 7 different occasions uh... only with 5 different women uh... uh... but uh... some of the women eh... more than once uh... some of them, quite a few times uh... in fact uh... it's hard to say father, I, I didn't exactly keep count but uh... uh, let let's say a dozen times in the last 2 weeks, uh... give or take a few times...
[goes into the closet, closes the door and talks to himself]
Alright. Its you and I. No way out. Get your shit together. Okay? Okay. Let's go.
[Opens door to a confused Rosalie and Nadja]
Last week on TV, I heard about a woman who stabbed her husband twenty-seven times. And you know why? Because he refused to put the top back on the mustard jar. Twenty-seven times! Can you imagine?
You know, I like you once. Maybe someday I like you again.

[Marlon holds bat up to Joey, ready to hit him]
Well, look at that.
How many homers has he hit, like... in lifetime?
We didn't do it. I swear to God we didn't. We found him outside, on the lawn...
...He was lying there, someone had shot him, and thrown him on the lawn...
...It was terrible. So we brought him inside and we... we put him in bed... and... yep... It must have been the Mafia.
Oh no, please, that's *my* job... taking care of the maggots.
Is that legal... having sex with a kangaroo?
Joey, if you're such a good Catholic, why do you commit adultery?
I'm a man; I got a lot of hormones in my body.
I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States of America.
...spacious skies and amber graves of liberty for all...
I am her mother. I do what I want.

Uh... 5 times the last 2 weeks... wait, no, that's wrong... it was uh... it was uh, 4 times this week, uh... with 3 women, and uh... 3 times last week with 2 other women... wow... plus one of the women from this week was the same as last week... or maybe 2 of the women was the same... so uh... I guess that uh... makes uh... what, uh... I dunno, 7 times... I mean it was more than uh... 7 times, father, it was, it was more like uh... 10 or 12 times but, you know, it was like on uh... 7 different occasions uh... only with 5 different women uh... uh... but uh... some of the women eh... more than once uh... some of them, quite a few times uh... in fact uh... it's hard to say father, I, I didn't exactly keep count but uh... uh, let let's say a dozen times in the last 2 weeks, uh... give or take a few times...
Mystic crystal let it shine, spikes just like a porcupine.
I feel better now. I had a good crap. That's all I needed.

[to Harlan and Marlon]
Mr. James, Mr. James. What can you tell us?
Get the fuck away from me! Get those fuckin' microphones out of my face!

[to the reporters]
Hey, what's going on? Is this about Joey? He dead or what?
Oh... yeah. The Guy. THAT guy. Fuck!
He's still alive. Why? What do you know about it?
